content.question: <math alttext="the indefinite integral of, the fraction with numerator d x, and denominator x squared, plus 4 x, plus 5, end fraction, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo stretchy="true">∫</mo><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="the inverse tangent of, open parenthesis, x plus 2, close parenthesis, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>tan</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the natural log of, the absolute value of x squared, plus 4 x, plus 5, end absolute value, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mtext> </mtext><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="2.4ex" width="0.0em"></mspace></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 1, and denominator 2 x plus 4, end fraction, times the natural log of, the absolute value of x squared, plus 4 x, plus 5, end absolute value, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>ln</mi><mtext> </mtext><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="2.4ex" width="0.0em"></mspace></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 1, and denominator one third x cubed, plus 2 x squared, plus 5 x, end fraction, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the inverse tangent of, open parenthesis, x plus 2, close parenthesis, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>tan</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 6.10: Integrating Functions Using Long Division and Completing the Square

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
